subject: Invoice mismatch detected for March 2025
body: Dear User, your GSTR-2A reconciliation for March 2025 shows 5 invoices with mismatches. Please review supplier GSTIN and amounts.

subject: GST filing failed for February 2025
body: Your GST return filing for February 2025 was rejected by the GST portal. Reason: Incorrect HSN code in 2 invoices.

subject: Upcoming filing deadline for April 2025
body: Reminder: GST filing for April 2025 is due on May 20, 2025. Please ensure invoices are reconciled before submission.

subject: Vendor GSTIN validation failed
body: Vendor XYZ Pvt Ltd has an invalid GSTIN. Please update vendor details to proceed with reconciliation.

subject: Audit trail export completed
body: Your requested audit trail export is ready for download. File contains all invoice edits and filing actions for Q1 2025.

subject: ITC shortfall detected for January 2025
body: Input tax credit claimed (₹1,20,000) is higher than eligible ITC (₹1,05,000) as per supplier filings. Please review invoices before re-filing.

subject: Support ticket #341 resolved
body: Your support ticket regarding 'invoice upload error' has been marked as resolved. Please confirm if issue persists.
